title: wine_Januik_2009_Ciel_du_Cheval_Vineyard_Syrah_(Red_Mountain)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 40441.
country: US.
description: In 2008, Januik made a single-vineyard Syrah from Lewis Vineyard fruit; now the winery has sourced fruit from Ciel du Cheval Vineyard, one of the superstar spots on Red Mountain. A compact wine that snaps right into focus, this offers varietal flavors of fig, berry and plum. A streak of smooth chocolate weaves through the finish, along with a hint of red licorice and underlying slate-like minerality..
designation: Ciel du Cheval Vineyard.
points: 92.
price: 35.0.
province: Washington.
region_1: Red Mountain.
region_2: Columbia Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
taster_twitter_handle: @paulgwineÂ .
